duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor, analyze, and interpret financial data to evaluate alternatives and recommend appropriate business solutions.
Support and forecast financial operations of the business, acting as a business partner to the Factory Controller.
Execute accurate and timely completion of accounting activities for overall financial statement preparation.
Prepare financial and management reports for different departments within the organization and for HUB & factory manager.
Analyze and control financial performance indicators, review accounting records, and participate in monthly closing.
Support in budget and monthly forecast preparation, including monthly cost tracking of Cost Centers and periodic review of cost center expenses.
Track overdue receivables and actively participate in collection & dispute resolution.
Take part in the implementation of new SAP Version 'REIWA' Project and conduct reconciliations of accounts as necessary.
Participate in SOX control testing, prepare relevant documentation, and prepare the project cost report.
Adhere to the core values of safety and integrity and take responsibility for actions while caring for colleagues and the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or business administration (Master's preferred)
